content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All components are connected to mine and transport coal

### Mixed Ore Mining Station at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system for ore movement
- Multiple burner inserters for material handling

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for input/output
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from empty or non-existent sources
- Verify that the source container exists and contains the items you want to extract
- Check if the specified chest contains the required items before attempting extraction

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Ensure all components of production lines are properly connected (belts, inserters, chests)
- Verify power connections between electricity producers and consumers

### Resource and fuel management
- Keep burner devices fueled - multiple mining drills are showing "out of fuel" warnings
- Monitor chest capacities - some chests are reaching full capacity which blocks production

### Production flow issues
- Several inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper supply chain connectivity
- Some furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" - verify material input flow is working
